title: Big Data-Driven Field Practice Design in Human Geography

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Geographical Concepts and Fundamental Smartphone Utilization Skills
context.additional_context: A program focusing on optimizing field training through regional case analysis and observing changes in agricultural/forestry economies

learning_goals: Scientifically select field practice routes and observation targets based on big data analysis results
Collect and visualize field data using smartphone apps to analyze regional economic changes
Share and discuss practical results with peer learners using cloud-based collaboration tools

resources: Public Big Data Portal Access Authorization
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
